::Hot Rod::

He took her hand, and kissed it.
"I am Hot Rod."

::DrillBit::

"Come on, love. Come back to me." He took her hand, and leened in, to
wisper to her.
"I ask your hand, in the joining."

OOC: DrillBit is really giving KitKat something to fight for. He is
proposing marrige to her. I just tryed to make is sound "alien" with
that "joining" stuff.
